jobDescription: Back-end web development for India's deep data driven digital logistics platform.  Involves all aspects of the SDLC, working across teams to deliver a world-class product.  Design, code, test, and support software applications and services using Python, SQL/NoSQL databases, REST APIs, and other technologies.
preferredQualifications: 2 years of full-time experience as a developer
Experience with multiple hands-on product development cycles
Ability to think big, work smart, and support the team
gpaCriteria: 70%+ in 10th and 12th grade. First class throughout academic career.
